basics.name: naeem akhtar
basics.technologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Angular 2+, Photoshop, PHP, Mysql

about.summary: With over 9+ years of combined experience in Web Development and Designing, I have worked in the Digital Marketing and Information Technology domains.
highlights: Skilled in developing GUI using HTML, CSS, JavaScript/JQuery, and responsive designs.
Skilled in hand-coding, implementing code and troubleshooting a variety of web development problems.
Improve accessibility and design of external and internal web applications using semantic markup integrated with server side language like PHP and .NET Environment.
Experience in LESS & SASS, PHP, and MySQL.
Thorough subject knowledge, strong analytical and troubleshooting skills with an ability to perform in challenging environments.

experience.summary: I have worked on several projects ranging from responsive layouts, CSS, HTML to developing newsletters and Marketing forms & mailers with notable clients like Airtel, WorldBook Online and Google (SEO developer).
Mainly worked on Facebook Application design and development.  Here I got to sharpen my skills at Photoshop.

experience.company: Bombay IT Solutions and Palsan Business Services
experience.summary: I was responsible for designing web templates in Photoshop and converting them in live HTML pages. Gradually I got myself working along with developers and embedding PHP codes.

projects.desc: As part of the project, the deliverables included Cybageâ€™s quarterly newsletter, greeting newsletters to clients, CSR scholarship forms, and client feedback form. My tasks also included front-end development on the Cybage corporate website.

We created different categories for different kind of clothes and they were being displayed as per the categories.
